Package server.control

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.control.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class contains all the game's mechanics - treatment of client call from remote - game's ticks - objects movements - objects collision - score update

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameManager()
      Main constructor - creation of the board with two teams - creation of all the lists for the objects to update (from game mechanics or from events) - creation of the player manager and the monitor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
      Function call by the Timer every 16 milliseconds This function execute 1 server tick and apply all game mechanics
      void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Method to add a player
      void addSpike​(SpikeCell spike)
      Method to add a spike, this spike will be add to the board at the and of a tick execution
      boolean gameOver()
      Method to know if the game is over
      Board getBoard()
      Method to get the board
      int getTimer()
      Method call by the client to know the time left in the game
      boolean initServer()
      Method initialization of the server
      void removeFood​(Food food)
      Method to remove a Food from the Board
      void removePlayer​(int id)
      Method to remove a player with a specific id from the board
      void removePlayerCell​(PlayerCell cell)
      Method to remove a player cell from the board
      void removeSpikeCell​(SpikeCell cell)
      Method to remove a SpikeCell from the Board
      void sendMousePosition​(int id, float mouseX, float mouseY)
      Method to ask to move a player in a specific direction
      void split​(int playerId, float mouseX, float mouseY)
      Method call on a client event, will ask to this player to split himself
      void throwFood​(int playerId, float mouseX, float mouseY)
      Method call on a client event, will ask to this player to throw food
